mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rs_student( id, hc_form_add1, hc_form_add2, hc_form_kuasheng, hc_form_baojiuye, hc_form_yuexin, hc_form_cj, hc_form_area, hc_form_province, hc_form_city, hc_form_kl, hc_form_bkh, hc_form_xm, hc_form_age, hc_form_birth, hc_form_xb, hc_form_sfzh, hc_form_bylb, hc_form_xslx, hc_form_mingzu, hc_form_zhengzhimianmao, hc_form_byxx, hc_form_hkszd, hc_form_sj, hc_form_dz, hc_form_zy1, hc_form_zy2, hc_form_zy3, hc_form_zy4, hc_form_zy5, hc_form_zytj, hc_form_szzx, hc_form_zxdz, hc_form_fzrxm, hc_form_fzrdh, hc_form_jdstarttime, hc_form_jdendtime, hc_form_yhtc, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_gx, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_name, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_tel, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_work, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_zw, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_gx, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_name, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_tel, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_work, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_zw, hc_form_bysj, hc_form_qq, hc_form_bz, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, hc_form_zhuangtai ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hcFormAdd1}, #{hcFormAdd2}, #{hcFormKuasheng}, #{hcFormBaojiuye}, #{hcFormYuexin}, #{hcFormCj}, #{hcFormArea}, #{hcFormProvince}, #{hcFormCity}, #{hcFormKl}, #{hcFormBkh}, #{hcFormXm}, #{hcFormAge}, #{hcFormBirth}, #{hcFormXb}, #{hcFormSfzh}, #{hcFormBylb}, #{hcFormXslx}, #{hcFormMingzu}, #{hcFormZhengzhimianmao}, #{hcFormByxx}, #{hcFormHkszd}, #{hcFormSj}, #{hcFormDz}, #{hcFormZy1}, #{hcFormZy2}, #{hcFormZy3}, #{hcFormZy4}, #{hcFormZy5}, #{hcFormZytj}, #{hcFormSzzx}, #{hcFormZxdz}, #{hcFormFzrxm}, #{hcFormFzrdh}, #{hcFormJdstarttime}, #{hcFormJdendtime}, #{hcFormYhtc}, #{hcFormJjlxrFaGx}, #{hcFormJjlxrFaName}, #{hcFormJjlxrFaTel}, #{hcFormJjlxrFaWork}, #{hcFormJjlxrFaZw}, #{hcFormJjlxrMaGx}, #{hcFormJjlxrMaName}, #{hcFormJjlxrMaTel}, #{hcFormJjlxrMaWork}, #{hcFormJjlxrMaZw}, #{hcFormBysj}, #{hcFormQq}, #{hcFormBz}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{hcFormZhuangtai} )
mapper.update: UPDATE rs_student SET hc_form_add1 = #{hcFormAdd1}, hc_form_add2 = #{hcFormAdd2}, hc_form_kuasheng = #{hcFormKuasheng}, hc_form_baojiuye = #{hcFormBaojiuye}, hc_form_yuexin = #{hcFormYuexin}, hc_form_cj = #{hcFormCj}, hc_form_area = #{hcFormArea}, hc_form_province = #{hcFormProvince}, hc_form_city = #{hcFormCity}, hc_form_kl = #{hcFormKl}, hc_form_bkh = #{hcFormBkh}, hc_form_xm = #{hcFormXm}, hc_form_age = #{hcFormAge}, hc_form_birth = #{hcFormBirth}, hc_form_xb = #{hcFormXb}, hc_form_sfzh = #{hcFormSfzh}, hc_form_bylb = #{hcFormBylb}, hc_form_xslx = #{hcFormXslx}, hc_form_mingzu = #{hcFormMingzu}, hc_form_zhengzhimianmao = #{hcFormZhengzhimianmao}, hc_form_byxx = #{hcFormByxx}, hc_form_hkszd = #{hcFormHkszd}, hc_form_sj = #{hcFormSj}, hc_form_dz = #{hcFormDz}, hc_form_zy1 = #{hcFormZy1}, hc_form_zy2 = #{hcFormZy2}, hc_form_zy3 = #{hcFormZy3}, hc_form_zy4 = #{hcFormZy4}, hc_form_zy5 = #{hcFormZy5}, hc_form_zytj = #{hcFormZytj}, hc_form_szzx = #{hcFormSzzx}, hc_form_zxdz = #{hcFormZxdz}, hc_form_fzrxm = #{hcFormFzrxm}, hc_form_fzrdh = #{hcFormFzrdh}, hc_form_jdstarttime = #{hcFormJdstarttime}, hc_form_jdendtime = #{hcFormJdendtime}, hc_form_yhtc = #{hcFormYhtc}, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_gx = #{hcFormJjlxrFaGx}, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_name = #{hcFormJjlxrFaName}, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_tel = #{hcFormJjlxrFaTel}, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_work = #{hcFormJjlxrFaWork}, hc_form_jjlxr_fa_zw = #{hcFormJjlxrFaZw}, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_gx = #{hcFormJjlxrMaGx}, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_name = #{hcFormJjlxrMaName}, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_tel = #{hcFormJjlxrMaTel}, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_work = #{hcFormJjlxrMaWork}, hc_form_jjlxr_ma_zw = #{hcFormJjlxrMaZw}, hc_form_bysj = #{hcFormBysj}, hc_form_qq = #{hcFormQq}, hc_form_bz = #{hcFormBz}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, hc_form_zhuangtai = #{hcFormZhuangtai} WHERE id = #{id}
